statements.select: select DOC_DETAIL_ID, ID, UID_ID, QTY_RECEIVED, QTY_DAMAGED, LP_ID, LOC_ID, USER_ID, CREATED_TIME, IS_DISABLED, LAST_MODIFIED, PRINT_TIME, STATUS, NORMAL_QTY, CONFIRM_TIME, BILL_NO, IS_PRINT from V_WMS_RCV_DOC_RV

select rd.id as rdid,rd.doc_code as rdcode,rd.status as rdstatus, NVL(rdd.pq_qty,0) as PQQTY, bs.supplier_name,wi.item_code, rdd.id as rddid,rdd.rcv_doc_id as rdddocid,rdd.expected_qty as rddjhqty,rdd.actual_qty as rddsjqty,rdd.EXTEND_COLUMN_2, rdr.qty_received as rdrsjqty,rdr.status as rdrstatus, rdp.qty_received as rdpsjqty,rdp.status as rdpstatus, rda.qty_received as rdasjqty,rda.status as rdastatus from v_wms_rcv_doc rd left join v_wms_rcv_doc_detail rdd on rdd.rcv_doc_id=rd.id left join v_wms_rcv_doc_rv rdr on rdr.doc_detail_id=rdd.id left join v_wms_rcv_doc_pq rdp on rdp.doc_detail_id=rdd.id left join v_wms_rcv_doc_act rda on rda.doc_detail_id=rdd.id left join v_wms_base_supplier bs on bs.id=rd.supplie_id left join v_wms_item wi on wi.id=rdd.item_id where rd.doc_code=#Number_ID#

select Count(*) as countnum from v_wms_rcv_doc_detail where rcv_doc_ID in (select rcv_doc_ID from v_wms_rcv_doc_detail where id=#ID#) and item_id in (select item_id from v_wms_rcv_doc_detail where id=#ID#)

select rdd.ID from v_wms_rcv_doc_detail rdd where rdd.rcv_doc_id in (select rcv_doc_id from v_wms_rcv_doc_detail where id=#ID#) and nvl(rdd.expected_qty,0)<>nvl(rdd.pq_qty,0) and rdd.extend_column_2='OP' and item_id in (select item_id from v_wms_rcv_doc_detail where id=#ID#)

SELECT bs.supplier_name, RD.ID AS RID, RDD.ID AS DID, RDD.ITEM_ID, NVL(RDD.PQ_QTY,0) as PQQTY, NVL(SU.ID,0) AS USER_ID, RD.WHSE_ID, RDD.RECEIVEDATE, SU.FIRST_NAME,SU.LAST_NAME, RD.DOC_CODE, IT.ITEM_CODE, IT.ITEM_NAME, RDD.EXPECTED_QTY, RDD.ACTUAL_QTY, RD.STATUS, RDD.EXTEND_COLUMN_2, RDD.SUPPLIER_ID, LM.LOC_ID, BL.LOC_CODE,BL.LOC_TYPE, NVL(SU.EXTEND_COLUMN_1,0), NVL(SU.EXTEND_COLUMN_2,0) AS USER_ORDER
FROM v_wms_rcv_doc_detail RDD INNER JOIN v_wms_rcv_doc RD ON(RDD.RCV_DOC_ID=RD.ID) INNER JOIN V_WMS_ITEM IT ON(RDD.ITEM_ID=IT.ID) LEFT JOIN V_WMS_ITEM_LOCATION_MAP LM ON(LM.ITEM_ID=IT.ID) LEFT JOIN V_WMS_BASE_LOCATION BL ON(BL.ID=LM.LOC_ID) LEFT JOIN v_wms_base_zone bz on (bl.zone_id=bz.id AND bz.is_disabled=0 ) LEFT JOIN V_PHR_SEC_USRS SU ON(SU.EXTEND_COLUMN_1=RD.DOC_CODE) left join (select * from v_wms_base_supplier bs where bs.is_disabled=0) bs on rd.supplie_id=bs.id WHERE rd.status='OP' and rdd.pq_qty is not null and rdd.pq_qty<>0 and rdd.pq_qty<>RDD.ACTUAL_QTY and rdd.extend_column_2<>'AP' and bz.WHSE_ID= (SELECT DISTINCT BZ.WHSE_ID FROM V_WMS_BASE_USER_ZONE ZO INNER JOIN V_WMS_BASE_ZONE BZ ON(BZ.ID=ZO.ZONE_ID) WHERE ZO.USER_ID=#ID#)
IT.ITEM_CODE=#ITEM_CODE#
order by rdd.line_no
statements.insert:
select V_WMS_RCV_DOC_RV_SEQ.NEXTVAL as value from dual
insert into V_WMS_RCV_DOC_RV ( DOC_DETAIL_ID, ID, UID_ID, QTY_RECEIVED, QTY_DAMAGED, LP_ID, LOC_ID, USER_ID, CREATED_TIME, IS_DISABLED, LAST_MODIFIED, PRINT_TIME, STATUS, NORMAL_QTY, CONFIRM_TIME, BILL_NO, IS_PRINT ) values ( #DOC_DETAIL_ID#, #ID#, #UID_ID#, #QTY_RECEIVED#, #QTY_DAMAGED#, #LP_ID#, #LOC_ID#, #USER_ID#, #CREATED_TIME#, #IS_DISABLED#, #LAST_MODIFIED#, #PRINT_TIME#, #STATUS#, #NORMAL_QTY#, #CONFIRM_TIME#, #BILL_NO#, #IS_PRINT# )
statements.update: update V_WMS_RCV_DOC_RV set DOC_DETAIL_ID = #DOC_DETAIL_ID#, UID_ID = #UID_ID#, QTY_RECEIVED = #QTY_RECEIVED#, QTY_DAMAGED = #QTY_DAMAGED#, LP_ID = #LP_ID#, LOC_ID = #LOC_ID#, USER_ID = #USER_ID#, CREATED_TIME = #CREATED_TIME#, IS_DISABLED = #IS_DISABLED#, LAST_MODIFIED = #LAST_MODIFIED#, PRINT_TIME = #PRINT_TIME#, STATUS = #STATUS#, NORMAL_QTY = #NORMAL_QTY#, CONFIRM_TIME = #CONFIRM_TIME#, BILL_NO = #BILL_NO#, IS_PRINT = #IS_PRINT# where ID = #ID#

update V_WMS_RCV_DOC_RV set
DOC_DETAIL_ID=#DOC_DETAIL_ID#
UID_ID=#UID_ID#
QTY_RECEIVED=#QTY_RECEIVED#
QTY_DAMAGED=#QTY_DAMAGED#
LP_ID=#LP_ID#
LOC_ID=#LOC_ID#
USER_ID=#USER_ID#
CREATED_TIME=#CREATED_TIME#
IS_DISABLED=#IS_DISABLED#
LAST_MODIFIED=#LAST_MODIFIED#
PRINT_TIME=#PRINT_TIME#
STATUS=#STATUS#
NORMAL_QTY=#NORMAL_QTY#
CONFIRM_TIME=#CONFIRM_TIME#
BILL_NO=#BILL_NO#
IS_PRINT=#IS_PRINT#
where ID = #ID#
